import numpy as np

import seaborn as sns
import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))
df=pd.read_csv('../input/d/anandhuh/covid19-india-statewise-vaccine-data/COVID-19 India Statewise Vaccine Data.csv')
